Positioner.name: Positioner
Positioner.description: This IPSO object should be used with a generic position actuator with range from 0 to 100%. This object optionally allows setting the transition time for an operation that changes the position of the actuator, and for reading the remaining time of the currently active transition.

Current_Position.name: Current Position
Current_Position.description: Current position or desired position of a positioner actuator.

Transition_Time.name: Transition Time
Transition_Time.description: The time expected to move the actuator to the new position.

Remaining_Time.name: Remaining Time
Remaining_Time.description: The time remaining in an operation.

Min_Measured_Value.name: Min Measured Value
Min_Measured_Value.description: The minimum value set on the actuator since power ON or reset.

Max_Measured_Value.name: Max Measured Value
Max_Measured_Value.description: The maximum value set on the actuator since power ON or reset.

Min_Limit.name: Min Limit
Min_Limit.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor.

Max_Limit.name: Max Limit
Max_Limit.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor.

Application_Type.name: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

Reset_Min_and_Max_Measured_Values.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
Reset_Min_and_Max_Measured_Values.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value.
